---

<!-- Do not edit this file. It is generated automatically -->

## intersection() function

`iterable1`에 포함된 `iterable2`의 모든 요소의 Iterable/AsyncIterable을 반환합니다<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function intersection<T>(
  iterable1: Iterable<T>,
  iterable2: Iterable<T>,
): IterableIterator<T>;
```

## Example

```ts
const iter = intersection([2, 1], [2, 3, 4]);
iter.next(); // {value: 2, done:false}
iter.next(); // {value: undefined, done: true}
```

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/Lazy/intersection.ts)
